Issue.creator: latitiah
Issue.summary: Negative Path: Different chaincode version used in install and approveformyorg
Issue.description: expect error *Proposed Steps:* {code} Given I have a bootstrapped fabric network of type solo And I want to use the new chaincode lifecycle When an admin sets up a channel And an admin builds a chaincode package And the organization admins install the version "2" built chaincode package on all peers Then a user receives an error containing "" {code} >
